item.title: Stateful, stateless, pure components - which is the fastest? ‚ö°Ô∏è
item.description: Intrdoduction I should probably justify my decision to write an article about the performance of different component types in React. After all, it’s not the most common topic among bears, right? üòã It all began when I had to prepare a safavicon.icomple project during the recruitment process in the XXX company. I’ve prepared a demo containing several components ‚Äî all of which were stateful. After a few hours, I received an e-mail containing feedback.
